original_text: The following day he arrived in Caesarea. Cornelius was expecting them and had called together his relatives and close friends.
korean_text: 이튿날 가이사랴에 들어가니 고넬료가 그의 친척과 가까운 친구들을 모아 기다리더니

sentences.original_text: The following day he arrived in Caesarea
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 날 그는 가이사랴에 도착했습니다

sentences.original_text: and had called together his relatives
